tuv.seg: One of the major goals of citizensinformation.ie is to provide information online which is accessible to all
Tá sé mar cheann de phríomhspriocanna citizensinformation.ie faisnéis a sholáthar ar an idirlíon a bhfuil fáil ag gach duine air

All information on this site is accessible using screen-readers. In most places on the website, the size of the text can be changed by clicking one of the “A” buttons in the top-right hand corner of the screen. This can also be changed by altering the settings in your browser

Comhlíonann an suíomh seo treoirlínte maidir le Inrochtaineachta Ábhar Gréasáin 2.0 an WAI (Web Accessibility Initiative/Tionscnamh Inrochtaineachta Gréasáin), mar ar forbraíodh iad ag Feadhnacht an Ghréasáin Dhomhanda/The World Wide Web Consortium
This site is accessible using most browsers
Is furasta teacht ar gach faisnéis ar an suíomh seo ag úsáid léitheoirí scáileáin
You can also access a version of the site specifically for mobile phones using the URL m.cinfo.ie
Is féidir aon bhrabhsálaí a úsáid chun an suíomh seo a rochtain
